data.actual_result: The scrolling of the name resets each time the time increases by one second.
data.expected_result: The name should scroll without any issues
data.short_description: Games with long names on X-Box dont scroll fully due as a second ticks by.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a person who is playing a game with a long name (I.E. Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain) - View the scrolling of the name
